sentences.en: All of these means can directly or indirectly damage crops, forests, and ornamental plantings.
sentences.cn: 所有的这些方法都能直接或间接地为害作物 、 森林和观赏植物.

sentences.en: All pressure differences between places on the earth's surface can be traced , directly or indirectly.
sentences.cn: 地球表面任何地区间的压力差都可以直接或间接地测算出来.

sentences.en: Back in the days of command lines and character - based menus, interfaces indirectly offered services to users.
sentences.cn: 回到命令行和 基于 字符的菜单时代, 那时界面通常间接地为用户提供服务.

sentences.en: Client involves DFG directly or indirectly in any type of fraud.
sentences.cn: 客户利用DFG直接或间接参与在任何类型的欺诈.

sentences.en: Drugs are indirectly responsible for the violence.
sentences.cn: 毒品是暴力产生的间接原因。

sentences.en: He referred indirectly to the territorial dispute.
sentences.cn: 他含蓄地提及了领土争端。
这消息我是间接听来的.

sentences.en: If the President was involved even indirectly, full disclosure would not be the course selected.
sentences.cn: 如果总统也牵连进去了,哪怕是间接的, 那就不会采取透露全部实情的做法.

sentences.en: Indirectly, I did cause her death. I shouldn'thave left her there.
sentences.cn: 的确，她的死是我间接造成的。我不该把她留在那里。

sentences.en: It has thus indirectly promoted fierce competition in international banking.
sentences.cn: 因此,这间接促进了国际银行市场的激烈竞争.

sentences.en: It was indirectly due to Cody that Gatsby drank so little.
sentences.cn: 盖茨比酒喝得极少,这得间接地归功于科迪.

sentences.en: Neutrons in the slow and moderate speed ranges can produce ionization indirectly in other ways.
sentences.cn: 慢中子和中能中子可以通过其它方式产生间接电离作用.

sentences.en: So it tries to control them indirectly.
sentences.cn: 因此它试图间接地控制它们。

sentences.en: Systematic psychological training helps directly and indirectly to form basketball consciousness.
sentences.cn: 系统的心理训练直接参与和间接辅助篮球意识的形成与发展.

sentences.en: The president is indirectly elected by parliament.
The two sides would only meet indirectly, through middlemen.
sentences.cn: 双方只会通过中间人间接接触。

sentences.en: You are also indirectly predicting the future of your project/process when you choose and configure the process for your project.
sentences.cn: 当您为您的项目选择和配置这个过程时同样要间接地预知您的项目/过程的未来。

words.tran_cn: 间接的；迂回的；非直截了当的

trans.tran_cn: 间接地，迂回地，婉转地，不坦率地
